title: This painting uses leather from an invasive Burmese python
description:
‘By virtue of collecting my work, you are becoming an activist, whether you like it or not.’

content: Fine artist Laura Shape uses quite an unexpected medium in her visual artwork. It lends striking patterns to her abstract canvases, while helping  restore rivers, reefs, and wetlands. Shape uses the … [+3224 chars]
